meanings.definition: To identify too closely with someone or something.
meanings.sent1: She overidentified with her favorite character in the book, imagining herself in their shoes.
meanings.sent2: He tends to overidentify with his sports team, feeling their wins and losses deeply.
meanings.sent3: The cat overidentified with the dog, trying to bark instead of meow.
meanings.sent4: The tree overidentified with the wind, swaying in every direction without stability.
meanings.sent5: The child overidentified with the superhero, believing they had superpowers.

meanings.definition: To attribute too much importance or significance to someone or something.
meanings.sent1: The teacher overidentified the student's success with her own teaching abilities.
meanings.sent2: She tends to overidentify her happiness with material possessions.
meanings.sent3: The chef overidentified the secret ingredient with the success of the dish.
meanings.sent4: The artist overidentified the color blue with feelings of sadness.
meanings.sent5: The coach overidentified the outcome of the game with the players' efforts.
